name: Hell'th
description:
Hell'th is a game where you get stronger when losing health.
This was a solo 72 h gamejam project where everything but audio was made from scratch and all made by myself.

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Fire: Left Click
Slash: Right Click
Dash: Spacebar

----
